ygData.subject: Re: Sean - Warrior only shield?
ygData.msgSnippet: The warrior only shield is from the pagesus thing in Lesser Faydark.  It has 10 dmg and is piercing.  Neat shield to say the least ... From: Mifsud, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
The warrior only shield is from the pagesus thing in Lesser Faydark. It has
10 dmg and is piercing. Neat shield to say the least


----- Original Message -----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>

Subject: [warriors_eq] Sean - Warrior only shield?
